title: Court Convicts Man After Woman Dies At "Slapping Therapy" Workshop In UK
content: An alternative healer was on Friday found guilty of the manslaughter by gross negligence of a diabetic woman who died from medical complications at a "slapping therapy" workshop in the UK.
summary: An alternative healer was on Friday found guilty of the manslaughter by gross negligence of a diabetic woman who died from medical complications at a "slapping therapy" workshop in the UK.

title: US Teen Charged After He Deliberately Forces Train To Crash For A Video
content: According to court documents, the Nebraska teen allegedly caused the train to go off the tracks, recorded the incident, and shared the footage on YouTube.
summary: According to court documents, the Nebraska teen allegedly caused the train to go off the tracks, recorded the incident, and shared the footage on YouTube.

title: France Railway Attacks Force New UK PM To Change Olympics Travel Plan
content: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer changed his travel plans to get to the Olympics on Friday after Eurostar trains were disrupted due to sabotage attacks against French rail networks, Downing Street said.
summary: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer changed his travel plans to get to the Olympics on Friday after Eurostar trains were disrupted due to sabotage attacks against French rail networks, Downing Street said.

title: 'Boop', 'The Ick', 'Chef's Kiss' New Additions To Cambridge Dictionary
content: A few other quirky additions include IYKYK, which is the written abbreviation for "if you know you know".
summary: A few other quirky additions include IYKYK, which is the written abbreviation for "if you know you know".

title: "Where Should We Go": Gazans Forced To Shelter In Former Prison Amid War
content: After weeks of Israeli bombardment left them with nowhere else to go, hundreds of Palestinians have ended up in a former Gaza prison built to hold murderers and thieves.
summary: After weeks of Israeli bombardment left them with nowhere else to go, hundreds of Palestinians have ended up in a former Gaza prison built to hold murderers and thieves.

title: Ancient Palestine Site Receives UNESCO Tag Amid Raging Conflict In Gaza
content: Amid the ongoing conflict in Gaza, the ancient heritage site of Saint Hilarion Monastery/Tell Umm Amer in Palestine on Friday received the UNESCO tag and was simultaneously put on the List of World Heritage in Danger after an "emergency nomination".
summary: Amid the ongoing conflict in Gaza, the ancient heritage site of Saint Hilarion Monastery/Tell Umm Amer in Palestine on Friday received the UNESCO tag and was simultaneously put on the List of World Heritage in Danger after an "emergency nomination".

title: 3 Bangladesh Student Protest Leaders Taken By Police From Hospital: Report
content: Bangladeshi police detectives on Friday forced the discharge from hospital of three student protest leaders blamed for deadly unrest, taking them to an unknown location, staff told news agency AFP.
summary: Bangladeshi police detectives on Friday forced the discharge from hospital of three student protest leaders blamed for deadly unrest, taking them to an unknown location, staff told news agency AFP.

title: Israel Slams UN Expert For "Anti-Semitism" Over Hitler-Netanyahu Comparison
content: Israel on Friday slammed a UN rights expert for "anti-Semitism" after she endorsed a social media post comparing Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to Adolf Hitler.
summary: Israel on Friday slammed a UN rights expert for "anti-Semitism" after she endorsed a social media post comparing Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to Adolf Hitler.

title: Train Driver Convicted Over Spain's Worst Crash In Decades That Killed 79
content: A Spanish train driver and a former traffic safety chief at national rail infrastructure operator ADIF were sentenced on Friday to two-and-a-half years in prison over a train disaster that killed 79 people 11 years ago.
summary: A Spanish train driver and a former traffic safety chief at national rail infrastructure operator ADIF were sentenced on Friday to two-and-a-half years in prison over a train disaster that killed 79 people 11 years ago.

title: WHO Sending Over 1 Million Polio Vaccines To Gaza To Protect Children
content: The World Health Organization is sending more than one million polio vaccines to Gaza to be administered over the coming weeks to prevent children being infected after the virus was detected in sewage samples, its chief said on Friday.
summary: The World Health Organization is sending more than one million polio vaccines to Gaza to be administered over the coming weeks to prevent children being infected after the virus was detected in sewage samples, its chief said on Friday.

title: "Barbaric, Genocidal Actions...": Priyanka Gandhi On Netanyahu's US Speech
content: Congress leader Priyanka Gandhi Vadra on Friday ripped into the Israeli government over its war on Gaza - which is now into its 10th month and has killed nearly 40,000 people - and called on the world to condemn Tel Aviv's "genocidal actions".
summary: Congress leader Priyanka Gandhi Vadra on Friday ripped into the Israeli government over its war on Gaza - which is now into its 10th month and has killed nearly 40,000 people - and called on the world to condemn Tel Aviv's "genocidal actions".

title: Laugh, Handshake: S Jaishankar Meets Russian Counterpart In Laos
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar met his Russian counterpart Sergey Lavrov on the sidelines of ASEAN events in Laos' Vientiane on Friday.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar met his Russian counterpart Sergey Lavrov on the sidelines of ASEAN events in Laos' Vientiane on Friday.

title: Franco-Swiss Airport Evacuated For "Security Reasons" Ahead Of Olympics
content: A Franco-Swiss airport was evacuated for security reasons on Friday, hours after arson attacks disrupted the French rail network ahead of the Olympics opening ceremony.
summary: A Franco-Swiss airport was evacuated for security reasons on Friday, hours after arson attacks disrupted the French rail network ahead of the Olympics opening ceremony.

title: Sunita Williams Stuck In Space, Still No Clue How She'll Return
content: Fifty days and counting, Indian-origin astronaut Sunita Williams remains in limbo, uncertain of when and how she may return to Earth.
summary: Fifty days and counting, Indian-origin astronaut Sunita Williams remains in limbo, uncertain of when and how she may return to Earth.

title: Jailed Imran Khan To Run For Oxford University Chancellor Post: Report
content: Pakistan's jailed former Prime Minister Imran Khan will apply for the post of Oxford University Chancellor, Imran's adviser on international affairs, Sayed Zulfi Bukhari told Geo News.
summary: Pakistan's jailed former Prime Minister Imran Khan will apply for the post of Oxford University Chancellor, Imran's adviser on international affairs, Sayed Zulfi Bukhari told Geo News.

title: Barack Obama, Wife Michelle Endorse Kamala Harris' Bid For US Presidency
content: Former President Barack Obama and his wife Michelle endorsed Kamala Harris' bid for president on Friday in a roughly one-minute long video that captured a private phone call between the couple and the current vice president.
summary: Former President Barack Obama and his wife Michelle endorsed Kamala Harris' bid for president on Friday in a roughly one-minute long video that captured a private phone call between the couple and the current vice president.

title: Sabotage, Fires Across France Rail Network Ahead Of Olympics: 10 Facts
content: Paris is decked up to host a grand opening ceremony later today for the 2024 Olympics, but went into a tizzy after the rail network was crippled by "malicious acts".
summary: Paris is decked up to host a grand opening ceremony later today for the 2024 Olympics, but went into a tizzy after the rail network was crippled by "malicious acts".

title: Rockets Fired At Bases Hosting US Troops In Iraq, Syria
content: Four rockets fell in the vicinity" of Ain al-Assad base in Anbar province, an Iraqi security source said. Another security official said an attack occurred with "a drone and three rockets" that fell close to the base perimeter.
summary: Four rockets fell in the vicinity" of Ain al-Assad base in Anbar province, an Iraqi security source said. Another security official said an attack occurred with "a drone and three rockets" that fell close to the base perimeter.

title: Elon Musk Disowned By Transgender Daughter: "He's Desperate For Attention"
content: Elon Musk's estranged transgender daughter, who he had alleged was "killed" by "woke mind virus", has "disowned" him.
summary: Elon Musk's estranged transgender daughter, who he had alleged was "killed" by "woke mind virus", has "disowned" him.

title: Greece's "Instagram Island" Santorini Worried About "Overtourism"
content: There are people spending a lot of money to be on Santorini and they don't want the island to be swamped. Instagram has defined the way people choose the places to visit
summary: There are people spending a lot of money to be on Santorini and they don't want the island to be swamped. Instagram has defined the way people choose the places to visit
